'use strict';

const DocumentPathItem = require('../../../../Protocol/Stubs/mysqlx_expr_pb').DocumentPathItem;
const Pa = require('parsimmon');

const parser = options => r => Pa
    .alt(
        Pa.string('**').map(data => {
            const dpi = new DocumentPathItem();

            dpi.setType(DocumentPathItem.Type.DOUBLE_ASTERISK);

            return dpi;
        }),
        r.documentPathLastItem
    );

module.exports = { name: 'DOCUMENT_PATH_ITEM', parser };
